name: com.niantic.lightship.maps
description: This library is used to download and render Niantic maptiles

samples.description: A sample demonstrating a top-down view of the map using an orthographic camera.
A sample demonstrating a third-person camera that follows and orbits around the player or other focused object.
This sample is a simple resource game using MapTiles. The game shows examples of using Map Feature data to place prefabs for gameplay elements and placing player created objects on the map.
A sample demonstrating how to render a map into a render texture using a secondary camera.
A sample demonstrating custom MapLayers with components that draw polygons and lines on the map.
